original: An Unattuned Spell Compendium. If a mage keeps this on their person for ten minutes, it will attune to their magic and display what spells they can cast. Once it attunes to a person, it can’t attune to anyone else.
translation: 一本还没有绑定的法术汇编。如果某位法师随身携带法术汇编超过10分钟，法术汇编就会与法师的魔力绑定，展示出他们所能施展的法术。一旦绑定后，就无法再与其他法师绑定。
